item.title: How do u do it!?!?!?smart peeps help
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

add this code underneath “moo” in npchandler.java

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("master")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "master is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "master is offline!"; } } }

then change else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253 <–this number to whatever you like to. also chnge master to your name

Read full topic
